Polar Survival.Elite 2: Treatment Effect +25% for targets of 55% HP or below.

SAR Professional.Elite 3: Battle skill Saturated Defense improved: After successfully retaliating an enemy attack, Snowshine gains another 10 Ultimate Energy.

Rescuer's Perseverance.Elite 3: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to slow Mood Drop of all operators in it by 14%

Happy-Go-Lucky.Elite 4: Assign to Control Nexus to grant all operators' Mood Regen +16%
